name: Teacher 3D Multiplayer
description:
Please consider supporting me on Patreon. I'll be able to support more users on the Server.

Game Rules:

If you are the Teacher relocate students around the map, killing who do not participate in the activities while you wait out the time. 

If you are a Student, try to sneek away from the group and try to unlock the Sniper Rifle by locating different keypads around the map. You can then  kill the Teacher. 

+15 points to Teacher who wait until Schools Out

+15 points to Students who help kill the Teacher

+1 points per Car Check Points hit

*fullscreen alt + enter

*music assgas by nullslightly
